{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2961963,"name":"Ben Bistline","username":"benjiboy2539","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/benjiboy2539/{size}/127059_2.png","created_at":"2021-07-16T01:14:36.476Z","cooked":"

Hi guys,

I’m trying to retrieve a limelight value, but it continues to return None. I’m not sure if I can access it, or if it is None for a certain reason. As seen here, one thing I’m trying to access is cx0.

I tested it without a target in sight, but I don’t think that should matter for a value like this.

Is it possible to retrieve the Crosshair A values?

Thanks,
Ben
